Drew Brees returns today for his fifth Pro Bowl as a backup to NFC starter Michael Vick , and continuing to participate when invited remains important to him. It is, definitely, because it's a lot of fun and I think it's a great representation of the league and we want to show the fans a good time, Drew Brees said yesterday.`` We want great events like this to continue, in places like Hawaii.''
